bonus.value: When dealing physical damage, increase final damage by 4%/5%/6%/7% and physical damage by an additional 2%/2.5%/3%/3.5% for 3 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

When equipping 2 or more physical weapons, increase final damage by 15%/17%/19%/21%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

mind.name: Hechizar
mind.desc: Lenta y pacientemente guía a la audiencia y a sí misma hacia la ilusión mágica.

memory.name: Mistificar
memory.desc: Las leyes más importantes son el "engaño", la "desorientación" y la "manipulación". Eso es lo que me digo a mí misma antes de cada espectáculo.

belief.name: Cautivar
belief.desc: A veces "ella" no puede decidir si ser felizmente inconsciente o si fingir ignorancia.

emotion.name: Engaño
emotion.desc: Tiene que engañar a todos, incluida ella misma.
